name: tomasborsje.github.io
description: This website was built with React with additional support for multiple self-contained apps on sub-pages.

name: Duskfall
description: A Minecraft MMORPG plugin, built on Spigot. Includes support for data-driven items, mobs, recipes, and an MMORPG code layer above Spigot's.

name: Rain Worldle
description: Guess from a list of Rain World characters, changing daily! Inspired by New York Times's 'Wordle'.
